timeline.bodyText:
The url created now is http://localhost:8080/geonetwork/search?any={searchTerms?}, that service doesn't exist.
The purpose of this link is to display the html search results?
To show the standard search results page, the url format should be:

http://localhost:8080/geonetwork/srv/eng/catalog.search#/search?any={searchTerms?}

I see it's also configured this urlrewrite rule:

http://localhost:8080/geonetwork/srv/eng/opensearch/htmlsearch?q=QUERYVALUE -->
http://localhost:8080/geonetwork/srv/eng/catalog.search#/search?any=QUERYVALUE

Any of the formats should work, please update the PR to fix it.
